snippet: More than 100 women marched on Saturday to protest the imposition of strict Islamic law in Timbuktu, but were dispersed by gunmen who fired shots in the air, witnesses said.
lead_paragraph: More than 100 women marched on Saturday to protest the imposition of strict Islamic law in Timbuktu, but were dispersed by gunmen who fired shots in the air, witnesses said.

headline.main: Women Protest Shariah Law in Mali
